mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtApplcnTgtGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_NO , MBR_NO , EVT_PARTCPTN_SN , FREE_GIFT_TURN , GOD_NO , ITM_NO , RTL_PRC , SALE_PRC , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_APPLCN_TGT_GOD WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEvtApplcnTgtGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EVT_APPLCN_TGT_GOD WHERE 1 = 1
